content.p: The University of Nottingham has run a Graduate Management Trainee scheme since 2008, including as part of the Ambitious Futures Programme for University Leadership, which closed in 2020. The new UoN Graduate Management Trainee scheme has been running since September 2021. The Graduate Management Trainee scheme is designed to provide the foundation for a Professional services career in the Higher Education sector. It is an 18-month scheme, in which trainees typically undertake three placements in different key service areas. Each placement has different responsibilities, including a blend of project work and operational service delivery. This provides the trainees with the opportunity to develop broad skills and experience in HE management and operations. More information about the Graduate Management Trainee Programme is available on the Professional Development webpages.
